ballot_measures.title: HJR 4
ballot_measures.description: Provide that only the state legislature has the authority to legalize marijuana, narcotics, or other psychoactive substances. This legislatively referred constitutional amendment is on the Idaho 2026 ballot.

ballot_measures.title: HJR 6
ballot_measures.description: Add constitutional language designating English as the official language of Idaho. This legislatively referred constitutional amendment is on the Idaho 2026 ballot.
